content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.12 > Section 82.12.99941 82.12.9994 << 82.12.99941 >> 82.12.9995 PDF RCW 82.12.99941 Exemptions — Bottled water — Primary water source unsafe. The provisions of this chapter do not apply in respect to the use of bottled water by persons whose primary source of drinking water is unsafe as provided in RCW 82.08.99941 . [ 2017 3rd sp.s. c 28 s 106 .] NOTES: Reviser's note: The tax preference enacted in section 106, chapter 28, Laws of 2017 3rd sp. sess. expires January 1, 2028, pursuant to the automatic expiration date in RCW 82.32.805 (1)(a). Existing rights and liability — Severability — Application — Effective dates — 2017 3rd sp.s. c 28: See notes following RCW 82.08.0531 .
